channel.title: Crdt on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Crdt on Arrans github.io

item.title: toeverything/AFFiNE
item.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [ə‘fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.

item.title: microsoft/FluidFramework
item.description: Library for building distributed, real-time collaborative web applications

item.title: streamich/json-joy
item.description: json-joy is a library that implements cutting-edge real-time and collaborative editing algorithms and utilities for JSON data models, with a focus on developing the JSON CRDT (Conflict-free Replicated Data Type) specification and implementation.

item.title: berty/berty
item.description: Berty is a secure peer-to-peer messaging app that works with or without internet access, cellular data or trust in the network
